item.title: #en @ 1501326368969089024
item.description: With the growing number of #opendata created, how do you optimise your database curation for the widest use? Our commentary at @J_Exp_Biol highlights the challenge & benefit of making databases, & provides tips for curating them. Enjoy! https://t.co/BHzM9cC3Pu https://t.co/pdGGDKaacX

item.title: #en @ 1501309609272909828
item.description:
New paper w/ a brilliant gang out today in @J_Exp_Biol today led by @dom_roche
We looked at the evolution of reproducible research practices (open data & code) in experimental biology over last 10 years & provide advice for improvement
Thread & link from Dom below: https://t.co/5wMMzT5KV0 https://t.co/CjAnCIQONH

item.description: ğŸ‘§ In 2020, women's gross hourly earnings were on average 13.0% below those of men in the EU. item.description:
Hello, community!
Open Data Protocol core beliefs are: - Users own their data, not mega-corporations - Decentralization is key to our future - Security & privacy of our users are of utmost importance - Freedom of speech means what it states
#OPENDATA $OPEN #BNB #BSC #CRYPTO
